name: Mo: The Guardian of Time
description:
Mo is an action platformer game with time control ability.

Zorde, an evil being has Stolen the time crystal which has disturbed the flow of time and brought in slow MO into the universe. Now it is up to Mo to stop him.

Play as Mo, the guardian of time and help him retrieve the crystal of time and bring balance to the universe.

A game made by Gintoki1234

Asset Used

Art from  : craft pix

SFX and Music from : Ultimate Sound FX Bundle
